channel.title: My Car Story With Lou Page
channel.description: My Car Story With Lou Page

item.title: Rare 1949 Cadillac with Factory Phone
item.description: A rare look at a 1949 Cadillac equipped with an unusual factory feature: a built-in telephone.

media:content.media:title: Rare 1949 Cadillac with Factory Phone
media:content.media:description: A rare look at a 1949 Cadillac equipped with an unusual factory feature: a built-in telephone.
media:content.media:credit: My Car Story With Lou Page

item.title: A Different Take on the 1988 Corvette
item.description: This 1988 Chevrolet Corvette stands apart with unique features and character beyond the standard model.

item.title: The Lightest GT40 Ever Built!
item.description: Exploring the design and engineering choices that made this GT40 one of the lightest examples ever produced.

item.title: 1957 Ford Ranchero
item.description: A closer look at the 1957 Ford Ranchero, the car-truck hybrid that made history with its unique design and lasting influence on automotive style.

item.title: Prototype 1978 Cadillac Eldorado
item.description: A rare prototype Eldorado from 1978—explore the bold design and features that never made it to full production.

item.title: An Adorable 1964 Studebaker
item.description: An Adorable 1964 Studebaker

item.title: Vintage Muscle, Roaring Back to Life: The ’69 GS 400 Stage 1
item.description: The 1969 Buick GS 400 Stage 1 roars back to life—bringing vintage muscle and raw performance into the spotlight once again.

item.title: Only 13 Or Fewer Of These Muscle Cars Are In Existence!
item.description: One of the rarest muscle cars ever built—fewer than 13 examples remain today, making this survivor a true collector’s dream.

item.title: Proud Dad Shows Off 1964 Buick Riviera
item.description: A father beams with pride as he presents his beautifully kept 1964 Buick Riviera—a true showcase of personal history and classic style.

item.title: This 6 Figure Car Is A Wonderful Time Capsule
item.description: Preserved in remarkable condition, this high-value classic captures its era perfectly—original details, untouched beauty, and timeless appeal.

item.title: Vintage Muscle, Roaring Back to Life: The ’69 GS 400 Stage 1
item.description: Vintage Muscle, Roaring Back to Life: The ’69 GS 400 Stage 1

item.title: 1957 Chrysler Windsor Regimental
item.description: With elegant lines and powerful presence, the 1957 Chrysler Windsor Regimental represents Chrysler’s bold styling era.

item.title: A Craigslist Purchase: 1965 Buick Riviera
item.description: From online listing to driveway star, this 1965 Buick Riviera proves some Craigslist finds are pure gems.

item.title: 1969 Plymouth Barracuda 340 Formula
item.description: Packing the 340 Formula V8, this ’69 Barracuda blends compact muscle with big performance—an underrated Mopar classic.

item.title: Roaring into history with the last Superbird!
item.description: One of the final Superbirds produced—this rare piece of Mopar history shows why it remains a collector’s dream.

item.title: Iconic 1970 Superbird in Limelight Green!
item.description: The legendary 1970 Plymouth Superbird shines in rare Limelight Green—a true NASCAR-inspired muscle car built for speed and style.

item.title: This Monkeemobile Had Too Much Torque!
item.description: A closer look at the iconic Monkeemobile, built for the 1960s TV band, and how its powerful setup delivered more torque than expected for a show car.

item.title: Amazing Hand-Painted Dukes Of Hazzard Motor!
item.description: A one-of-a-kind motor painted by hand with a Dukes of Hazzard theme—showcasing bold colors, intricate details, and true custom car artistry.

item.title: This 1973 Chevrolet is Resto Modded
item.description: Old-school looks, modern performance—check out this stunning 1973 Chevy resto mod build.

item.title: 1970 Chrysler 300H Hurst in White n Gold
item.description: A rare 1970 Chrysler 300H Hurst finished in its signature white and gold—showcasing bold muscle car styling and luxury touches that make it a collector’s dream.
